entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 07:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening except periods of rain along parts of the coast overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Windy. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
